Post._content:
##  - <font color="red"></font>
###  get
```javascript
// 
window.open()
```
### post

1. application/octet-stream
	-  application/octet-stream: [blob](https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/API/Blob/Blob)[createObjectURL](https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/API/URL/createObjectURL)
	```javascript
	var blob = new Blob(['1111'],{type:'application/vnd.ms-excel'})
	var link = URL.createObjectURL(blob)
	let a = document.createElement("a"); // a
	let event = new MouseEvent("click"); // 
	a.download = "text.txt"; // 
	a.href = link // URLa.href
	a.dispatchEvent(event); // a
	```

<!-- more -->


2. base64url
	- 
	|     |   |
	|  --------  | --------  |
	| doc  | data:application/msword;base64, |
	| docx  | data:application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document;base64, |
	| xls  | data:application/vnd.ms-excel;base64, |
	| xlsx  | data:application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet;base64, |
	| pdf  | data:application/pdf;base64, |
	| ppt  | data:application/vnd.ms-powerpoint;base64, |
	| pptx  | data:application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.presentationml.presentation;base64, |
	| txt  | data:text/plain;base64, |
	
	- 
	|     |   |
	|  --------  | --------  |
	| png  | data:image/png;base64, |
	| jpg  | data:image/jpeg;base64, |
	| gif  | data:image/gif;base64, |
	| svg  | data:image/svg+xml;base64, |
	| ico  | data:image/x-icon;base64, |
	| bmp  | data:image/bmp;base64, |
	- base64-base64url,
	> a
	```javascript   
		let a = document.createElement("a"); // a
		let event = new MouseEvent("click"); // 
		a.download = "text.txt"; // 
		a.href = link //  URLa.href
		a.dispatchEvent(event); // a
	```
	> wondow.open()
	```javascript
		windo.open()
	```


## Blob
- ArrayBuffer, ArrayBufferView, Blob, DOMString  Array 
- [](https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/API/Blob/Blob)[MIME](https://www.w3school.com.cn/media/media_mimeref.asp)
- <font color="red"></font> 

## ?
### blobMIMEadownload?
> `download`
> download[MIME](https://www.w3school.com.cn/media/media_mimeref.asp)
```javascript
var blob = new Blob(['1111'],{type:'application/vnd.ms-excel'}) //exce
a.download = "text.txt"; // txt
```

### ?
> `text.jpg``vscode.png``text.text`,****
![](/images/download/download01.png)

## 
### ,
1. barse64
2. barse64canvasdrawImagebaser64,drawImageimg
3. urlimage 
```javascript
var img = new Image();
img.crossOrigin = 'anonymous'
img.src = '.....';
img.onload = function() {
	let canvas = document.createElement('canvas');
	canvas.width = img.width;
	canvas.height = img.height;
	let content = canvas.getContext('2d');
	content.drawImage(img,0,0,img.width,img.height);
	let url = canvas.toDataURL();
	windo.open(url)
}
```

### input
1. awindow.openahref
2.  URL.createObjectURL() blob\file
3. blobnewblob
4.    
```javascript
let text = document.getElementById("text");
let download = document.getElementById("download");
text.addEventListener('input', function() {
	console.log(this.value)
})
download.addEventListener('click', function() {
	var blob = new Blob(['1111'],{type:'application/vnd.ms-excel'})
	console.log(blob);
	var link = URL.createObjectURL(blob)
	// window.open(link)
	let a = document.createElement("a"); // a
	let event = new MouseEvent("click"); // 
	a.download = "text.txt"; // 
	a.href = link // URLa.href
	a.dispatchEvent(event); // a
})
```

###  get

### post

1. application/octet-stream
	-  application/octet-stream: [blob](https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/API/Blob/Blob)[createObjectURL](https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/API/URL/createObjectURL)
	```javascript
	var blob = new Blob(['1111'],{type:'application/vnd.ms-excel'})
	var link = URL.createObjectURL(blob)
	let a = document.createElement("a"); // a
	let event = new MouseEvent("click"); // 
	a.download = "text.txt"; // 
	a.href = link // URLa.href
	a.dispatchEvent(event); // a
	```

<!-- more -->

2. barse64canvasdrawImagebaser64,drawImageimg
3. urlimage 
```javascript
var img = new Image();
img.crossOrigin = 'anonymous'
img.src = '.....';
img.onload = function() {
	let canvas = document.createElement('canvas');
	canvas.width = img.width;
	canvas.height = img.height;
	let content = canvas.getContext('2d');
	content.drawImage(img,0,0,img.width,img.height);
	let url = canvas.toDataURL();
	windo.open(url)
}
```

```javascript
let text = document.getElementById("text");
let download = document.getElementById("download");
text.addEventListener('input', function() {
	console.log(this.value)
})
download.addEventListener('click', function() {
	var blob = new Blob(['1111'],{type:'application/vnd.ms-excel'})
	console.log(blob);
	var link = URL.createObjectURL(blob)
	// window.open(link)
	let a = document.createElement("a"); // a
	let event = new MouseEvent("click"); // 
	a.download = "text.txt"; // 
	a.href = link // URLa.href
	a.dispatchEvent(event); // a
})
```
